Wilson|Danielle Davenport|Deborah Rush|Doug Darwin|Gabriel Mann|June Ballinger|Katherine Kell|Kathleen Littlefield|Laila Robins|Laura Sohn|Mark Puchinsky|Masa Dakic|Michael Cerveris|Michael Quinlan|Peter Bradbury|Ramzi Khalaf|Raymond Bokhour|Ryan Andes|Sarah Kell|
Episode.Overview: Red and Liz investigate Orion Relocation Services, an organization that surreptitiously facilitates the disappearance and relocation of criminals. Katarina delves into the memories of an old friend in order to get additional information about the Townsend Directive.
